plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Bunnies like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐰 I am orange and rabbits love to munch on me!

plant.question: I have a stem, leaves, and smell very nice. People give me as gifts. What am I?

hints.text: 🎁 You can put me in a vase.

plant.question: I grow on a tree and I am red, green or yellow. You can eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 I can be sweet or sour.
🐛 Sometimes a worm likes to live in me.

plant.question: I am tall and have leaves and branches. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I need sunshine to grow tall.
🪵 You can make furniture out of me.

plant.question: I am long and green and grow on a vine. You can eat me as a vegetable or turn me into a pickle! What am I?

hints.text: 🥪 You might find me on a sandwich.

plant.question: I am a seed that pops into a fluffy treat when heated. You can eat me at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🍿 I am often eaten with butter and salt.
🔥 I need heat to become what I am.

plant.question: I am a very tall plant. I have big yellow kernels that you can eat. What am I?

hints.text: 🌻 My kernels grow on a cob.
🐔 Chickens love to eat me too.

plant.question: I have prickly thorns but beautiful flowers. Bees love to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 I am often red, pink, or white.
🎁 People give me to show love.

plant.question: I am a round fruit with a green rind and sweet, juicy, red inside. What am I?

hints.text: 🍉 I am very refreshing on a hot day.
☀️ I need lots of sunshine to grow.

plant.question: I am a seed that can be ground into flour. You can use me to make yummy bread. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I am often golden in color.
🍞 I am used to make toast.
🐭 Mice sometimes like to eat me.

animal.question: I say 'meow' and love to chase string. What am I?

hints.text: 🧶 I like to play with yarn.
🐈‍⬛ Some people keep me as a pet.

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones.

animal.question: I quack and waddle. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I like to swim in a pond.

animal.question: I say 'moo' and give milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I provide milk for people to drink.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🌍 I live in Africa and Asia.

animal.question: I roar and I'm the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 👑 I have a mane around my head.

animal.question: I hop around and carry my baby in a pouch. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I like to eat eucalyptus leaves.

animal.question: I slither on the ground and sometimes hiss. What am I?
I live in the ocean and have eight arms. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I have suckers on my arms.
🌊 I can change color to hide.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes and live in Africa. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 My stripes are unique, like fingerprints.
